name: Lead The Way
description:
-- Gameplay --

On a far away land, with a handful of people who don't know anything. You are a lord who recently came to this place with his villagers.

You need to learn the ways of survival. Then teach them to the villagers. How to gather, grow and construct...

Become a proper society before the winter comes. All hands on deck, everybody will work for the necessary preparations.

More you know as a leader, the better you can manage your people.

Lead the way!

.

* Increase the population up to 50 villagers

* Gather 25000 resources for whole winter

* Capture at least 75 resource points on the island

* Learn 7 different ways of survival techniques 

. -- Controls --

Movement : AWSD

Jump : Space

Interact : Left Mouse Click

Evade : Right Mouse Click

You can also connect a gamepad and play with that if you like. The control scheme should automatically detect it. I would still suggest sticking to the keyboard though :)

. -- Used Assets --

SYNTY Prototype & Knight Packages ( Soldier & Building Models )

https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/5217

Kevin Iglesias Animation Package ( Villager Animations )

https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/36307

Low Poly Landscaping Tool ( Terrain-Water-Sky )

https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/17305

Menu music is from one my past jam friends.

Willa Morgan

. -- Comments on Backtrace --

It is a shame that I haven't used it before. I mostly use internal tools or Crashlytics for error reporting. But after trying Backtrace, I think I will give it a go on a bigger scale project for sure.

It was super useful to be able to get insights from non-editor play sessions.  With the manual reporting, you can even use it as a tracking tool rather than just for reporting "errors".

Didn't have enough time to play with its docs. I am sure it has even more capabilities than what I have seen in this 2 day period. Can't wait to play with it more :)
